Game: Yuu Yuu Hakusho Gaiden 1994-01-24T00:00:00-08:00 Yuu Yuu Hakusho Gaiden (幽☆遊☆白書 外伝) is a 1994 adventure game by Nextech under contract from Sega for the Sega Mega Drive, made with the Yuu Yuu Hakusho license. 1 <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/64b877c8-d391-4eee-95c5-d68004ca44c1.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/fc98f32a-d35e-4948-962e-3d9b5e577df3.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/9c34e421-d0a9-4740-b8a1-ea988d075473.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/d1d3832d-025a-4c53-8590-3cefc0e38d85.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/50fa8d51-f6c9-4a37-b815-48a643656841.jpg 1.375 Not Rated Adventure Nextech Sega
